text:
Came here during the evening and clocked a 1 hour trail here.. Nice lake with some nature trails if you walk away from the lake. Trail was great and it did not feel like it was nestled among the residential area. For a moment , I thought I was in a hiking trail haha.

Great way to destress and glad we came by. Second time here and still enjoyed the walks. Inside repellent is a must. Toilets are available too!! Plus point.
Amazing park with a long promenade lined by conserved mature rain trees. Great view of the lake at the end of the extension bridge from the mall besides Brewerkz.

Very pretty lake with a nice breeze. Good for a walk any time of the day. Just note that the park is still in the final stages of construction so not all is accessible yet. Many young families frequent this place so watch out for the kids tooâ€¦
New park situated at Bidadari area that has a lake and connected to the Bidadari park and mall.

A prominent feature of Bidadari Park is the Alkaff Lake.
This scenic Alkaff Lake not only is the Park's focal point but also served as a stormwater retention pond for flood control purposes.
